_legend.rw: R=read-only (no state change), W=write (modifies state or sends data externally)
_legend.type: cli=kubectl exec agent <cmd>, http=kubectl exec curl <endpoint>
_legend.winner: When CLI and HTTP overlap, winner indicates better output format

tier1_workload_data.desc: All entities with tags from all sources
tier1_workload_data.note: HTTP preferred over CLI - native JSON
HTTP preferred - native JSON; CLI -v for verbose text

http_endpoints._note: HTTP endpoints accessible via curl from inside containers. Authentication required for most IPC endpoints.

endpoints.desc: Discovery endpoint - lists all endpoints, config, features

system_probe.note: Only available when system-probe is enabled

dogstatsd.note: Use CLI commands (dogstatsd-stats) or agent IPC endpoints for DogStatsD info
